Module com.example.game
Package com.example.game.scene.account

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.example.game.scene.account.Account
public class Account extends Object
Account class. Saves/create player's account. Saves player's new high score.
Version:
Dec 16, 2022
Author:
Kelly Kai Ling Tan-modified, Coursework: COMP2042

    • accountExist

      public static Account accountExist(String username) throws IOException
      Check if the account exists or not based on username. Check username from the file (account.txt). If there is same username, return the account. If there is no existing username, return null.
      Parameters:
      username - player's username
      Returns:
      Account
      Throws:
      IOException

    • makeNewAccount

      static Account makeNewAccount(String username) throws FileNotFoundException
      Create new account for new username. Adds the account to the arraylist of Account (accounts).
      Parameters:
      username - player's username
      Returns:
      Account
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
